Class LedgerOpenOp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.bookkeeper.client.LedgerOpenOp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    class LedgerOpenOp
extends Object
implements org.apache.bookkeeper.proto.BookkeeperInternalCallbacks.GenericCallback<LedgerMetadata>
    Encapsulates the ledger open operation
